Mark Sanford , a vocal critic of President Donald Trump ,] [V: lost] [ARG1: his South Carolina congressional seat] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] [ARGM-TMP: hours after the president injected himself into the bitter Republican primary by stoking memories of the incumbent 's public extramarital affair seven years ago] .

Rep. Mark Sanford , a vocal critic of President Donald Trump , lost his South Carolina congressional seat Tuesday hours after [ARG0: the president] [V: injected] [ARG1: himself] [ARG2: into the bitter Republican primary] [ARGM-MNR: by stoking memories of the incumbent 's public extramarital affair seven years ago] .

Rep. Mark Sanford , a vocal critic of President Donald Trump , lost his South Carolina congressional seat Tuesday hours after [ARG0: the president] injected himself into the bitter Republican primary by [V: stoking] [ARG1: memories of the incumbent 's public extramarital affair seven years ago] .
